name: The Time Traveler's Garden
description:
You're a kitchen boy in a garden-to-table restaurant, and you need to grow all of your own ingredients. Fortunately, you have a time machine, so any seed you plant can be harvested in a snap! The only problem is that the apocalypse is scheduled to arrive before you can harvest.

The game was not built to run as an HTML5 game, but since it works we decided to make that available! For the best quality and experience, download either the Windows or Mac build below.

Developed By:

  • Phil Ogden (@pdog1) - Design, Programming
  • Dan Alexander (@lxndrdagreat) - Programming
  • Joel Shaffer (@maachlan) - Programming
  • Tommy Philyaw - Programming
  • Omni Jacala (@artsyomni) - Art, Music
  • Andrew Coleman (@colossalcake) - Art
  • Chris Szczesiul (@chrisszczesiul) - Art

Special Thanks to Cara Jones (@cawatoons)
Sounds Effects from: GDC Game Audio Bundle - SONNISS - Royalty Free Sound Effects
